Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: palomino \pal`o*mi"no\ (p[a^]l`[u^]*m[=e]"n[-o]) n. [Sp. palomino, resembling a dove.] A horse of light tan or golden color with cream or white mane and tail, and often having white markings on the legs and face. [WordNet 1.5]
palomino n : a horse of light tan or golden color with cream or white mane and tail
